r.s: PHP implementation of the XML-RPC protocol
r.d:
A PEAR-ified version of Useful Inc's XML-RPC for PHP.
It has support for HTTP/HTTPS transport, proxies and authentication.
r.n: * Eliminate path disclosure vulnerabilities by suppressing error messages when eval()'ing. * Eliminate path disclosure vulnerability by catching bogus parameters submitted to XML_RPC_Value::serializeval(). * In XML_RPC_Server::service(), only call createServerPayload() and createServerHeaders() if necessary. Fixes compatibility issue introduced in Release 1.3.0RC1 for users who set the $serviceNow parameter of XML_RPC_Server() to 0. Bug 4757. * Change "var $errstring" to "var $errstr". Bug 4582. Was put into CVS version 1.75 of RPC.php but didn't make it into RELEASE_1_3_1.
